FLOW.COMMENT: STEP 1 - Acquire signed and encrypted message

INVOKE.COMMENT: STEP 1 - Acquire signed and/or encrypted MIME message
STEP 2 - Attempt to create MIME object from it to get S/MIME status

BRANCH.COMMENT: STEP 3 - Check whether message is encrypted
STEP 4 - Check whether message is signed

SEQUENCE.NAME: false
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: IF FALSE - Log error and exit

INVOKE.COMMENT: -- Convert the content to a String
